alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Pulaski; Texas; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:29AM CDT until May 21 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WRIGHT...SOUTHEASTERN LACLEDE...SOUTHWESTERN PULASKI AND NORTHWESTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 229 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles southwest of Fort Leonard Wood, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Fort Leonard Wood... Plato... Competition... Roby... Lynchburg... Dry Knob... Falcon... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
